message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
Let's split it evenly, Alice. It's the fairest way to do this.
Meet me in the middle, Bob. It's getting late!
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. Let's split it closer to 50/50 this time.
Last chance, Bob. Take it or walk away!
Alice, we're running out of time. Let's make a deal before it's too late.  I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it, but don't come crying to me later!
Alice, we're both losing money with every round. Let's be reasonable and make a deal before the value of the money drops even further.
This is my last chance to get something decent. Take it or walk away, Bob!
Alice, this is my final offer. We're both losing money rapidly, and we need to agree soon to avoid getting nothing at all.  I'm willing to give you a larger share to finalize this.
This is my last, last chance. Take it or we both get nothing.
